description:
The Lake Laurentian Conservation area consists of 950 hectares (2400 acres) of protected green space just minutes from downtown Sudbury. This trails is a short trail threw mixed forest that gives a good view of the beaver pond wet lands.
For more info check out http://www.nickeldistrict.ca/ndca/.
directions: Turn onto Ramsey Lake road at Science north and travel for 2km to the turnoff for South Bay road. Follow South Bay road past the conservation area turn off and continue .5 km untill you get to the parking area at the Boi Ski Chalet
title: LLCA Beaver Pond Trail
